mapper.sql: STU_ID, MANAGER_ID, STU_NAME, STU_IDCARD, STU_TEL, STU_WECHAT, STU_QQ, STU_STATE, STU_POLOTICS, STU_ENGLISH, STU_SUB1, STU_SUB2, STU_RESUB1, STU_RESUB2, STU_REENGLISH, STU_INTERVIEW, STU_ACCOUNT, STU_PWD,STU_CANDIDATE, STU_SEX,STU_TOTALSCORE1,STU_TOTALSCORE2,STU_SPECIALTYCODE,STU_MAJORNAME, STU_MAJORCONDITION,STU_GRADUATIONSCHOOL,STU_GRADUATIONMAJOR,STU_GRADUATIONTIME,STU_MASTERTYPE,STU_STUDYTYPE, STU_HONOR,STU_EMAIL
mapper.insert: insert into SCOTT.STU_INFO (STU_ID, MANAGER_ID, STU_NAME, STU_IDCARD, STU_TEL, STU_WECHAT, STU_QQ, STU_STATE, STU_POLOTICS, STU_ENGLISH, STU_SUB1, STU_SUB2, STU_RESUB1, STU_RESUB2, STU_REENGLISH, STU_INTERVIEW, STU_ACCOUNT, STU_PWD ) values (#{stuId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{managerId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{stuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stuIdcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stuTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stuWechat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stuQq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stuState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stuPolotics,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{stuEnglish,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{stuSub1,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{stuSub2,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{stuResub1,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{stuResub2,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{stuReenglish,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{stuInterview,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{stuAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stuPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into SCOTT.STU_INFO
STU_ID,
MANAGER_ID,
STU_NAME,
STU_IDCARD,
STU_TEL,
STU_WECHAT,
STU_QQ,
STU_STATE,
STU_POLOTICS,
STU_ENGLISH,
STU_SUB1,
STU_SUB2,
STU_RESUB1,
STU_RESUB2,
STU_REENGLISH,
STU_INTERVIEW,
STU_ACCOUNT,
STU_PWD,

mapper.update:
update SCOTT.STU_INFO
MANAGER_ID = #{managerId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STU_NAME = #{stuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STU_IDCARD = #{stuIdcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STU_TEL = #{stuTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STU_WECHAT = #{stuWechat,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STU_QQ = #{stuQq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STU_STATE = #{stuState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STU_POLOTICS = #{stuPolotics,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STU_ENGLISH = #{stuEnglish,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STU_SUB1 = #{stuSub1,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STU_SUB2 = #{stuSub2,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STU_RESUB1 = #{stuResub1,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STU_RESUB2 = #{stuResub2,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STU_REENGLISH = #{stuReenglish,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STU_INTERVIEW = #{stuInterview,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STU_ACCOUNT = #{stuAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STU_PWD = #{stuPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where STU_ID = #{stuId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update SCOTT.STU_INFO set MANAGER_ID = #{managerId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STU_NAME = #{stuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STU_IDCARD = #{stuIdcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STU_TEL = #{stuTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STU_WECHAT = #{stuWechat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STU_QQ = #{stuQq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STU_STATE = #{stuState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STU_POLOTICS = #{stuPolotics,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STU_ENGLISH = #{stuEnglish,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STU_SUB1 = #{stuSub1,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STU_SUB2 = #{stuSub2,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STU_RESUB1 = #{stuResub1,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STU_RESUB2 = #{stuResub2,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STU_REENGLISH = #{stuReenglish,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STU_INTERVIEW = #{stuInterview,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STU_ACCOUNT = #{stuAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STU_PWD = #{stuPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where STU_ID = #{stuId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update STU_INFO
STU_TEL=#{stuTel},
STU_ACCOUNT = #{stuAccount},
STU_PWD = #{stuPwd},
where
STU_CANDIDATE = #{stuCandidate}
1>2

update STU_INFO
STU_TEL = #{stuTel},
STU_IDCARD = #{stuIdcard},
STU_EMAIL = #{stuEmail},
STU_QQ = #{stuQq},
STU_WECHAT = #{stuWechat},
STU_HONOR = #{stuHonor}
where
STU_ID = #{stuId}

update STU_INFO
MANAGER_ID = #{managerId} ,STU_STATE = '3'
where STU_ID = #{stuId}
where 1>2
mapper.select:
select
from STU_INFO
STU_TEL LIKE '%'||#{stuTel}||'%'
and STU_NAME LIKE '%'||#{stuName}||'%'

select
from STU_INFO where STU_STATE != '-1' and STU_STATE <= '9' order by STU_MAJORNAME

select
from STU_INFO where STU_STATE != '-1' order by STU_MAJORNAME,STU_TOTALSCORE1 desc
mapper.update:
update STU_INFO
STU_NAME = #{stuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STU_TEL = #{stuTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STU_POLOTICS = #{stuPolotics,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STU_ENGLISH = #{stuEnglish,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STU_SUB1 = #{stuSub1,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STU_SUB2 = #{stuSub2,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STU_MAJORCONDITION = #{stuMajorcondition},
STU_GRADUATIONSCHOOL = #{stuGraduationschool},
STU_GRADUATIONMAJOR = #{stuGraduationmajor},
STU_MASTERTYPE = #{stuMastertype},
STU_TOTALSCORE1 = #{stuTotalscore1}
where STU_ID = #{stuId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and STU_STATE != '-1'
update STU_INFO set STU_STATE = '-1',MANAGER_ID = '' where STU_ID = #{stuID}
mapper.select: select stu_state,count(*) num from STU_INFO where stu_state >'9' group by stu_state order by stu_state

select a.STU_ID,a.STU_NAME,A.MANAGER_ID,a.STU_CANDIDATE,b.MANAGER_NAME
from STU_INFO a,MANAGER_INFO b
a.MANAGER_ID = b.MANAGER_ID
and STU_CANDIDATE LIKE '%'||#{stuCandidate}||'%'
and STU_NAME LIKE '%'||#{stuName}||'%'
mapper.update:
update STU_INFO
STU_RESUB1 = #{stuResub1},
STU_RESUB2 = #{stuResub2},
STU_INTERVIEW = #{stuInterview},
STU_REENGLISH = #{stuReenglish}
where STU_ID = #{stuId}
where 1>2
mapper.select:
select from STU_INFO
STU_CANDIDATE LIKE '%'||#{stuCandidate}||'%'
and STU_NAME LIKE '%'||#{stuName}||'%'
order by STU_MAJORNAME,STU_TOTALSCORE1 desc

select STU_STATE from stu_info
where stu_id = #{stuId}
